title: Tennis Match: Paolini Beats Boulter in Mexico
summary: Katie Boulter from Britain played a tennis match against Jasmine Paolini from Italy in Mexico. Boulter started very strong and won the first set without losing any games. But then, Paolini fought back and won the next two sets to win the match. Boulter had been winning many matches before this, but Paolini played better in the end. Paolini said she stayed calm and hit the ball harder to win. This match was part of a tournament called the Merida Open, and Paolini moved on to the next round.

background_read: Tennis is a popular sport played all over the world. Players use rackets to hit a ball back and forth over a net. Matches are divided into sets, and the player who wins the most sets wins the match. Tournaments like the Merida Open bring together players from different countries to compete for titles. Winning runs happen when a player keeps winning games, which builds confidence.
